message.body: How did the interview and test go?
Test felt easy and interview, guy liked me but would be pay cut so im declining
Should get my test results in about a week. Interviewer wants me to meet the drs nomext week. If they like me then I have the job. But it pays $14 an hr and im currently about $16-17
So you are going through another round of interviews even though you don't want it? Can you get them to go up?
No he said me starting at 14 was bec of my experience. That's basically the highest... but no im going to call him tomorrow to thank him for the interview and politely decline
And its only front desk. Basically there us no room for advancement unless I become a manager which could take years or never happen.
I have another exam to take anyway so we'll see how that one goes when I take it lol. It clerical but for city hall. That would be better anyway
Its scheduled for dec but I can walk in any day to take itso much go this week or next
Okay let me know how it goes.
